notes: Initial release, ported from macOS app.
Fixed crash caused by copy to clipboard failure.
Fixed visibility of copy feature tag buttons.
Minor tweaks to match macOS app.
Added support for editing and copying the personal messages right in the app.
Added personal messages to picked features and added to LOG .json file.
Added ability to save the report as a .features file.
[URB] Added a warning toast and prevent adding feature for a post link which already exists.
Updated the keyboard shortcuts to match the macOS app.
Hide 'Open in Vero Scripts' button in list for non-picked features.
Added dirty state handling for the log to prevent closing the app without saving.
Fixed bug where 'many' features was treated as zero.
Added settings to pick culling tool (default Bridge 2024) and AI check tool (default internal tool).
Added buttons in the settings pane to pick a culling and AI check tool.
